thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Tourmaline Says Current 2018 Capital Budget Remains At $1.1 Bln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tourmaline Says Current 2018 Capital Budget Remains At $1.1 Bln
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Tourmaline Oil Corp:
* TOURMALINE GROWS 2017 CASH FLOW BY 65%, DELIVERS EARNINGS OF $346.8 MILLION, AND ANNOUNCES INAUGURAL DIVIDEND IN Q1 2018
* TOURMALINE OIL CORP - CURRENT FULL-YEAR 2018 CAPITAL BUDGET REMAINS AT $1.1 BILLION
* TOURMALINE OIL CORP - COMPANY EXPECTS TO SPEND LESS THAN $300.0 MILLION DURING Q1 OF 2018
* TOURMALINE OIL CORP - FULL-YEAR 2018 AVERAGE PRODUCTION GUIDANCE REMAINS UNCHANGED AT 270,000-280,000 BOEPD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
